official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should encourage the development of nonnuclear energy resources and should pursue the conservation of domestic energy in all sectors of use.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should encourage the accelerated commercialization of alternative energy technologies and should encourage the conservation of domestic energy in all sectors of use.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should encourage the development of nonnuclear energy resources and should pursue the conservation of domestic energy in all sectors of use.
